items.sentence: Even though Tom is sick, he\'s planning on going to school.

Now that you are a college student, you should know better.
She stole a lot of money from him, so now she is in prison.
Socially awkward children are more susceptible to bullying.
Studying how to communicate effectively is time well spent.
Tom realized that he couldn\'t play tennis as well as Mary.
